fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 5.70 points or 0.03% to settle at 17,624.45. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 1.74% to 11.94. HDFC Bank, Infosys and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The April 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 April 2023.
